actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To require the National Telecommunications and Information Administration to extend the IANA functions contract unless it certifies that the United States Government has secured sole ownership of the .gov and .mil top-level domains, and for other purposes.
short_title: Securing America's Internet Domains Act of 2016

titles.title: Securing America's Internet Domains Act of 2016

To require the National Telecommunications and Information Administration to extend the IANA functions contract unless it certifies that the United States Government has secured sole ownership of the .gov and .mil top-level domains, and for other purposes.
